title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. 

(a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 

(Amendment) and Variation of Days ( Portlaoise) Order 2021. 
(b) This Order shall come into operation on 29th September 2021
text_norm: 1 (a) order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day ( portlaoise) order 2021 (b) order shall come operation 29th september 2021

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 

of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) 

the substitution at reference number 138 for the matter in column 
(4) of the following: 

“Portlaoise –Fifth Wednesday of September 2021 and fifth 
Thursday in September 2021. All sittings at 10.30 a.m.”,
text_norm: 2 first schedule district court (areas) order 1961 (s.i no 5 1961) hereby amended - (a) substitution reference number 138 matter column (4) following portlaoise -fifth wednesday september 2021 fifth thursday september 2021 sitting 10.30 a.m

3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 

5 of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) 

the substitution at reference number 122 for the matter in column 
(4) of the following: 

“Portlaoise –Fifth Wednesday of September 2021 and fifth

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not
text_raw:
4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [465] 3 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service 
 15 September 2021 

PAUL KELLY, 
 Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to sign 

documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

MICHELLE JOHNSON, 
 Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 

authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to section 
10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [465]

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the variation of Days at Portlaoise.
